item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Understudied protein blobs have global effects on cell biochemistry (14 points | 2 comments)
2. On Impactful AI Research (124 points | 16 comments)
3. Show HN: Hosting my website using my own C web server (53 points | 14 comments)
4. Hack GPON – how to access, change and edit fibre ONTs (29 points | 2 comments)
5. Beyond the route: Introducing granular MTA bus speed data (158 points | 42 comments)
6. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (671 points | 194 comments)
7. The Calculator that spawned the Microprocessor (2009) (61 points | 16 comments)
8. Move Fast and Abandon Things (362 points | 159 comments)
9. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (114 points | 236 comments)
10. A Little History of the Anchovy (18 points | 6 comments)
11. Committing to Rust in the Kernel (137 points | 80 comments)
12. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (69 points | 6 comments)
13. Winamp Legacy player source code (629 points | 281 comments)
14. Why Most Published Research Findings Are False (2005) (134 points | 159 comments)
15. Neat Randomized Algorithms: RandDiag for Rapidly Diagonalizing Normal Matrices (53 points | 4 comments)
16. Wasm2Mpy: Compiling WASM to MicroPython so it can run on Raspberrys (50 points | 13 comments)
17. Show HN: Velvet – Store OpenAI requests in your own DB (30 points | 19 comments)
18. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (161 points | 53 comments)
19. Debian Packaging from First Principles (12 points | 1 comment)
20. Hacker plants false memories in ChatGPT to steal user data in perpetuity (92 points | 31 comments)
21. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (128 points | 97 comments)
22. "Creounity Time Machine", the universal date converter for coin collectors (40 points | 2 comments)
23. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (155 points | 100 comments)
24. The quest to build a telescope on the moon (123 points | 71 comments)
25. A few secure, random bytes without `pgcrypto` (18 points | 8 comments)
26. Rotation-Based Compression (21 points | 10 comments)
27. DOJ accuses Visa of monopoly that affects price of 'nearly everything’ (396 points | 326 comments)
28. Hardening C Against ROP: Getting CET Shadow Stacks Working (9 points | discuss)
29. Mkbsd: Download all the wallpapers in MKBHD's "Panels" app for free (9 points | 9 comments)
30. Microprogramming: A New Way to Program (10 points | 8 comments)
